verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: marked] [ARG1: his second Memorial Day] [ARGM-PRD: as commander in chief] [ARGM-MNR: by laying a wreath at the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier at Arlington National Cemetery] .
[ARG0: Trump] marked his second Memorial Day as commander in chief by [V: laying] [ARG1: a wreath] [ARGM-LOC: at the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier at Arlington National Cemetery] .
